TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlElementAttributes extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

summary.span: 代表 物件的集合， 使用這些物件來覆寫其序列化類別的預設方式。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects used by the to override the default way it serializes a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由屬性類別。The is returned by the property of the class. 藉由使用類別和類別，您可以覆寫預設採用的方式序列化類別。By using the class and the class, you can override the default way that the serializes a class. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化`Transportation`類別，其中包含名為的單一欄位`Vehicles`傳回。The following example serializes the `Transportation` class, which contains a single field named `Vehicles` that returns an . 此範例會先套用兩個執行個體類別，即可`Vehicles`指定的物件類型的欄位插入陣列。The example first applies two instances of the class to the `Vehicles` field that specifies the types of objects the inserts into the array. 這個範例會建立兩個物件來覆寫套用至屬性的行為`Vehicles`屬性。The example then creates two objects to override the behavior of the attributes applied to the `Vehicles` property. 兩個覆寫的物件加入至的集合。The two overriding objects are added to the collection of an . 最後，此範例會新增要，以允許插入到新的物件類型所傳回`Vehicles`欄位。Lastly, the example adds the to an , allowing the to insert the new object types into the returned by the `Vehicles` field. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttributes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttributes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttributes Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
